quotes.quote: Truth will only make you unpopular.
An unpopular rule is never long maintained.
Unpopular but right is what you're going for.
In all the world, rich people are very unpopular.
Chastity is the most unpopular of the Christian virtues.
Intelligent people are always on the unpopular side of anything.
First make yourself unpopular, then you will be taken seriously.
Unpopular speech is absolutely vital to the health of our nation.
All progress has resulted from people who took unpopular positions.
At times unpopular measures are needed in order to change behaviour.
To solve big problems you have to be willing to do unpopular things.
Sometimes in this world you make unpopular decisions because you think they're right.
Human beings do not like to look squarely into the face of tragedy. Gloom is unpopular.
Unpopularity is a excellent salve to the conscience; it is delicious to be misunderstood.
Honesty and unpopular opinions are the toughest sell in a country with an irony-deficiency.
Being unpopular is never easy; but being unpopular in a good cause is a shield against despair.
